alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Squirrel Lake, or 19 miles southeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Flowage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
